dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1077 IS: Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cardin (for himself, Ms. Mikulski, Mr. Carper, Mr. Warner, Mr. Coons, and Mr. Kaine) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Chesapeake Bay Initiative Act of 1998 to provide for the reauthorization of the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act .

Section 502(c) of the Chesapeake Bay Initiative Act of 1998 ( 16 U.S.C. 461 note; Public Law 105â€“312 ) is amended by striking fiscal years and all that follows through the period at the end and inserting fiscal years 2014 through 2018..
